channel.title: 317 help - item help
channel.description: Okay the dragon claws in my server need a requirement of 60Defence and 60 attack..how can i edit that to only 60 att? please help asap..ppl are getting pissed

item.title: 317 help - item help
item.dc:creator: @Usagi Usagi
item.description:
@Usagi wrote:

[font=courier]Open up client.java and make sure you know the itemid for the dragon claws. Now search for if (CLAttack > getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) { sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item."); sM("You need to have an "+statName[playerAttack]+" level of "+CLAttack+"."); GoFalse = true; }

[font=courier] and then above all that it should have if(wearID == 4363){ GoFalse = true; }

[font=courier] add in this above or just under it so it looks something like this

if(wearID == 4363){ GoFalse = true; } if(wearID == ItemID Of Dragon Claws) { GoFalse = false; } if (CLAttack > getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) { sM("You are not a high enough level to use this item."); sM("You need to have an "+statName[playerAttack]+" level of "+CLAttack+"."); GoFalse = true; }

Read full topic
